Some people think it's the lion 'cause, you know, they big,
translation.fr: Certains disent que c'est le lion, car il est gros,

translation.en: but it's actually the...
the pistol shrimp.
Little bitty guy, look harmless,
translation.fr: Une petite crevette à l'air inoffensif,

translation.en: but hit you so fast, it vaporizes the water around it.
translation.fr: mais qui vous attaque si vite, que l'eau autour est vaporisée.

translation.en: Eight thousand degrees hotter than the surface of the sun.
translation.fr: Quatre mille degrés de plus que la surface du Soleil.

translation.en: The shock waves,
rips the flesh right off the bone.
And when it's all over,
it's just Mr. Shrimp sitting there, eating...
translation.fr: il ne reste que Mme Crevette mangeant...

translation.en: anything that's left.
Yeah, so?
So...
We get all these powers from animals, right?
translation.fr: on tire ces pouvoirs des animaux, non ?

translation.en: Guess what animal I got?
You made the right choice.
translation.fr: Tu as fait le bon choix.

translation.en: Smart man.
Hey! What the hell are you doing?
Get the fuck out of here!
Gotta be honest,
I was a little disappointed we took you without a fight.
translation.fr: j'étais déçu qu'on ne puisse pas se battre.

translation.en: Got a lot of dead friends because of you.
translation.fr: Mes potes sont morts à cause de toi.

translation.en: Let's go.
- Something funny? - Don't move!
translation.fr: - Tu trouves ça drôle ? - Ne bouge pas.

translation.en: Took you long enough.
translation.fr: Tu en as mis du temps.

translation.en: Yeah, you're welcome.
That's disgusting, by the way. Come on.
Tracy?
I'm Robin.
I gotta get you out of here.
translation.fr: Je vais te sortir de là.

translation.en: I'm with your dad.
I gotta bring you to him.
He's here.
Really?
He came?
I knew he'd come.
All right, I'm gonna check the other room.
No!
I want you on the deck now. It's the only way
- she can get off this damn ship. - Yes, ma'am.
translation.fr: - C'est la seule sortie. - Oui, madame.

translation.en: All security personnel should be on full alert.
The asset is missing. Multiple intruders. I want a full sweep of the ship.
translation.fr: L'atout a disparu. Plusieurs intrus. Passez tout au peigne fin.

translation.en: We gotta keep moving.
- Was that Robin I heard? - Yeah, she's in the control room.
translation.fr: - C'est Robin ? - Elle est au poste de contrôle.

translation.en: I think she knows where Tracy is.
Hatch 16.
Robin, hatch 16.
All right, we gotta get to the bow.
translation.fr: On doit aller à la proue.

translation.en: - Tracy? - Robin?
Where is she? Tracy?
What's going on?
I told her anything goes wrong, meet at the front of the boat.
translation.fr: Je lui ai dit de me retrouver à l'avant.

translation.en: I missed you so much.
We gotta go.
You okay?
Let's get you out of here. Come on.
How much time we got left?
Less than five, more than zero.
translation.fr: Moins de cinq, plus que zéro.

translation.en: - Still got your pill? - Yeah, I'm saving that one.
translation.fr: - Tu as la pilule ? - Je la garde.

translation.en: Saving it for what?
Last resort.
I got this, go!
Get her to the lifeboat!
Come on!
Where's Robin?
I don't know.
- All right, we're gonna run. Ready? -
Stay with me. Go, go, go!
Come on! Your dad's right behind us.
Don't shoot the girl!
It's stuck!
- Now! - Now!
Yes!
Meet me at the lifeboat.
- Where's Robin? - Thought she was with you.
translation.fr: - Où est Robin ? - Elle était avec toi.

translation.en: Major!
Stop, Major!
You see who I have here?
Get off of me!
I want Tracy out here now!
- Give me the pill. - It's not gonna work on you.
translation.fr: - Donne-moi la pilule. - Ça ne marchera pas.

translation.en: - It's got to be me. - No, Daddy.
- You know what'll happen if you do that. - I will kill her, Arthur, right now,
translation.fr: - Tu en connais l'issue. - Je vais la tuer, Arthur,

translation.en: right in front of you.
I love you more than anything in the world, you hear me?
translation.fr: Je t'aime plus que tout, tu m'entends ?

translation.en: I love you, but there's no way we're leaving her behind.
translation.fr: Je t'aime, mais on n'abandonne pas Robin.

translation.en: All of you out of the boat, now!
Look, if anything goes wrong,
you drop this boat down and get out of here, okay?
All right.
I'm gonna end this.
Hold your fire.
I want Tracy out here now!
Wait.
- Robin, you all right? - Don't talk to her!
translation.fr: - Robin, ça va ? - Ne lui parlez pas.

translation.en: Let me tell you something, Robin.
translation.fr: Je vais te dire une chose.

translation.en: You did a great job.
translation.fr: Tu as fait du bon boulot.

translation.en: You saved my daughter's life.
Now you listen up, Doc!
You got one chance.
You let her go, I let you live.
This isn't a negotiation.
No.
It's something else.
I told you what was gonna happen, didn't I?
Now you tell me...
am I lying?
Hey, come on Daddy.
Daddy, come on!
Daddy!
Daddy, come on!
Daddy?
Yes! Yes!
Thank you.
Stand up.
Y'all ready?
Tracy, do you think you could heal a gunshot wound?
translation.fr: Tracy, tu pourrais guérir une blessure par balle ?

translation.en: Good morning, New Orleans!
Who dat say they gon' beat dem Saints?
translation.fr: Qui avait prédit la défaite des Saints ?

translation.en: Man, it went down in the Dome last night.
translation.fr: Ça n'a pas rigolé au Dome hier soir.

translation.en: It was even louder on the streets.
translation.fr: Et encore moins dans les rues.

translation.en: Did y'all hear about the two explosions last night after the game?
translation.fr: Vous avez entendu parler des deux explosions hier soir ?

translation.en: The Coast Guard's saying they can't find any sign of the ship,
translation.fr: Les garde-côtes disent qu'il n'y a aucun signe du cargo

translation.en: and then, NOPD has absolutely nothing to say about it.
translation.fr: et la police a refusé de commenter.

translation.en: So what's next for you?
Well, first I think I'll have a long talk with my captain
translation.fr: Je vais avoir une longue discussion avec mon capitaine

translation.en: then maybe find a journalist looking for their next big story.
translation.fr: et trouver un journaliste à la recherche de son prochain article.

translation.en: You blow that whistle, ain't no going back.
Yeah.
Well, let's see these assholes try to hide when everyone knows what they're doing.
translation.fr: On verra s'ils se cachent quand le monde saura ce qu'ils font.

translation.en: Let me ask you something.
You think this is really over?
For me, it is.
It's time to jet.
Hey, you.
Go to my truck.
Make sure you check the trunk.
You remember what I said?
translation.fr: Tu te souviens de ce que j'ai dit ?

translation.en: There's something great inside you, Robin.
Use it.
Here.
- What's this? - What's it look like?
translation.fr: - C'est quoi ? - Ça a l'air de quoi ?

translation.en: Why you got my mama's phone, man? It's a long story.
translation.fr: - Pourquoi tu as le portable de ma mère ? - Longue histoire.

translation.en: Seriously.
Frank!
I love you, Ma.
I love you too.
Man, I am about to beat on your eardrums with this one.
translation.fr: Je vais vous exploser les tympans avec celle-là.

translation.en: It's the first single from brand new MC Robin Reilly, featuring Chika.
translation.fr: Voici le tout premier single de MC Robin Reilly avec Chika.

translation.en: Let's go!
